ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they are reminded they do not pay heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And when they are warned they pay no heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and when they are admonished, they pay no heed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They pay no attention when they are reminded
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they do not understand, when explained to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when they are reminded, they pay no attention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when they are reminded, they mind not,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and, when reminded, do not remember
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And heed not when they are reminded,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When they are reminded, they do not pay heed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when they are admonished, they receive not admcnition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and [even] when admonished do not take admonition,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And, when they are admonished, pay no heed,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when they are reminded, they pay no attention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When they are reminded, they do not remember.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when reminded, they pay no attention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when they are reminded, they remember not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:13] and [even] when they are reminded, [when] they are admonished with the Qur’ān, they are not mindful, they do not heed the admonition,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 505 (And heed not) and take no admonition (when they are reminded) by the Qur'an,
